name: Flucorite - Tower of Darkness
description:
Story;

"Wake up at the bottom of tower, surrounded by strange creatures made of darkness, your only way out is to climp up. Go little one the answer you looking for will be at the highest floor of the tower."

Feature;

- An endless runner with random generated platform

Game version 0.1

Control:

A- move left

D-move right

Space Bar-Jump

Keypad 1-Shoot

Keypad 2-Dash
